text: ayatinal ivar parayunnatine parri ksamikkuka. suryeadayattinu mumpum, suryastamayattin mumpum ninre raksitavine stutikkunnateateappam avanre parisud'dhiye ni prakirttikkukayum ceyyuka. ratriyil cila nalikakalilum, pakalinre cila bhagannalilum ni avanre parisud'dhiye prakirttikkuka. ninakk santrpti kaivannekkam
